divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside to look at New Year's fireworks. They were not by any other fireworks, isolated near the horizon. orange fire in the sky, because there were about 3-4 of them. they would slowly appear and disappear and sort of float in the same area. At one time, they made a line of three, and the two on the sides swung down to make a triangle. Then, they went back to a random formation and zipped up into the sky leaving a trail, almost as if a shooting star. They were there for about 8 minutes until they would start disappearing with none to fill-in. In awe, starting calling friends. They disappeared or faded into the sky.
Summary: appearing and disappearing orange/red dots in the sky. Made triangles and lines.
